effect.diamond-pearl: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.platinum: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the foe flinch.
